description: Inkflow Is The Ultimate AI Book Generator.  Generate 20,000+ Words In Just A Few Clicks.
title: Inkflow | Index | AI Book Generator
introduction: Inkflow is the world's easiest to use AI book writer, primarily developed for generating non-fiction books. It allows users to generate a 20k to 200k+ word AI book in just a few clicks, with no limits, no restrictions, and no credits required.
features: Generate a 20k to 200k+ word AI book
Enter book title and generate book outline
Enter chapter details with auto-outline or custom outline
Powered by AWS for fast, secure content generation and storage
targetPeople: Aspiring authors, content creators, and individuals looking to generate non-fiction books quickly and efficiently.

faqs.question: Is there a limit on content?
faqs.answer: No, there are no limits on content.

faqs.question: How long does it take to generate a book?
faqs.answer: The time to generate a book is not specified, but the process is designed to be quick.

faqs.question: What language model is used?
faqs.answer: Two language models are available to tailor the book content for specific needs.

faqs.question: Is editing required after the book is generated?
faqs.answer: Some editing may be required after the book is generated.

faqs.question: Can I provide the outline for my book?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can enter custom outline titles and structure.

faqs.question: How is the book or course word length determined?
faqs.answer: The word length is determined by the user's input and the selected generation model.

faqs.question: Can I use Inkflow on any device?
faqs.answer: Yes, Inkflow can be used on any device.

faqs.question: Can I get the output in PDF format?
faqs.answer: The output is available in .docx format.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: The refund policy is not specified on the website.

faqs.question: Can Inkflow generate an AI Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, Inkflow can generate an AI Course.
